critique: The document establishes an interagency committee to monitor and enforce labor obligations of Canada and Mexico under the USMCA. It aims to ensure fair labor practices and compliance with trade agreements. The order establishes an interagency committee to monitor and enforce labor obligations of Canada and Mexico. It prioritizes the role of the federal government in overseeing international trade agreements and labor standards. The initiative reflects a moderate interventionist approach to ensure fair labor practices within the framework of international trade.
